title: $1,275 - 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath Updated Apartment in Heart of Canaryville
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Amazing 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom first floor newly renovated apartment located in the heart of Canaryville. Situated on quiet block down the street from St. Gabriel's Parish and the Canaryville Little League Field. Close to 47th Street Red Line and Dan Ryan Expressway. Includes deck, stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher), in unit washer and dryer, and back yard.   Tenant pays for utilities (water excluded). Cats and small dogs allowed with one time pet fee ($250). Minimum 600 credit score. Online credit and tenant reports along with proof of annual income required for rental application. Gross monthly income must be 2.5x rent.   MOVE IN FEE WAIVED IF YOU APPLY WITHIN 24 HOURS OF VIEWING!!!!  Date Available: July 1st 2022. $1275/month rent w/ $250 non refundable move in fee per adult.  CALL/TEXT/EMAIL
